page.title: 06CROPS 3 Melton Ross & Elsham
page.content:
GRASS One farm has grass for 200 Breeding Sheep and followers.Another a small paddock with a few bullocks for fattening.At Top Farm,Croxton the only farm building now remaining houses 300 Pigs. VINES Melton High Wood planted a vineyard of 300 Vines in 1984 as a new enterprise. At that time it was the most northerly vineyard in this country.
FARM EQUIPMENT Potato planter Sprayer Potato harvester Tractor + tools Combine Forklifts Sugar beet harvester Trailers
Most of the farms will have all of the above equipment,but some will share the less used items .
